abstract: Canada's new Liberal government scraps costly plan made by former Conservative leaders to build monument next to Supreme Court; will instead hold national design competition to find cheaper alternative.
lead_paragraph: The new Liberal government said that a monument to victims of Communism proposed by a private group would not be built next to the Supreme Court.
snippet: The new Liberal government said that a monument to victims of Communism proposed by a private group would not be built next to the Supreme Court.
